mapper.insert: insert into zj_bank (bank_id, user_id, bank_code, bank_name, bank_number, account_name, bank_logo, add_user_id, add_time, update_time, delete_flag, update_user_id, tel) values (#{bankId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update zj_bank set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bank_code = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_number = #{bankNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_logo = #{bankLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_user_id = #{addUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select bank_id, user_id, bank_code, bank_name, bank_number, account_name, bank_logo, add_user_id, add_time, update_time, delete_flag, update_user_id, tel from zj_bank where bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select bank_id, user_id, bank_code, bank_name, bank_number, account_name, bank_logo, add_user_id, add_time, update_time, delete_flag, update_user_id, tel from zj_bank
